items.name: Iddichaka Thoran
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish made from tender jackfruit slices saut√©ed with spices, curry leaves, and coconut, creating a flavorful dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapatis + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Beef Varattiyath
items.description: A flavorful and spicy Kerala beef dish. The beef is slow-cooked with a mix of spices, coconut, and other aromatic ingredients until it reaches a rich, dry consistency.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Unniappam
items.description: A traditional South Indian snack originating from Kerala, made from a batter consisting of rice flour, jaggery (unrefined cane sugar), ripe bananas, coconut pieces, roasted sesame seeds, and cardamom powder. This batter is then poured into special molds and fried until golden brown, resulting in sweet, spongy, and flavorful dumplings

items.name: Idiyappam & Veg Stew
items.description: A classic South Indian dish consisting of idiyappam, also known as string hoppers or steamed rice noodles, served with a flavorful vegetable stew.

items.name: Bhopali Paneer
items.description: A delectable North Indian dish originating from Bhopal, featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a rich and creamy gravy infused with aromatic spices, tomatoes, onions, and cashews, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying vegetarian delicacy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bhopali Rezala
items.description: A rich, creamy mughali dish which is a native of Madhya Pradesh. Chicken cooked with onion paste, cashew, yogurt and a lot of spices making it a creamy delicious dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Indori Poha
items.description: Indore style preparation of poha (flattened rice). The dish includes ingredients like mustard seeds, curry leaves, peanuts, turmeric and a garnish with sev (crispy fried noodles) and fresh coriander.

items.name: Sabudana Kichidi
items.description: A flavorful Indian dish made with soaked tapioca pearls cooked with potatoes, peanuts, and spices, offering a delightful blend of textures and a subtle yet satisfying taste.

items.name: Masoorchi Aamti
items.description: A popular Maharashtrian dish made from sprouted lentils (masoor dal) cooked with a blend of spices, coconut, and tamarind, resulting in a tangy and flavorful lentil curry
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Lamb Kharda
items.description: A dish that originates from the Indian state of Maharashtra. It consists of tender pieces of lamb cooked with a spicy and flavorful paste known as "kharda"; a fiery paste made from green chilies, garlic, and various spices, pounded together to create a robust and intense flavor profile. It adds a distinct heat and depth to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Vada
items.description: A popular Indian snack made from spiced mashed potatoes (aloo) mixed with various herbs and spices, formed into small patties or balls, coated in gram flour batter, and then deep-fried until golden brown and crispy. (3 vadas)

items.name: Masala Bhaat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato, and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander

items.name: Aloo Chana Achari Pulao
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish that combines potatoes (aloo), chickpeas (chana), and pickling spices (achari) to create a delicious one-pot meal. Served with raita + side salad + achar.

items.name: Dindigul Thalappakatti Biryani
items.description: A signature South Indian dish featuring fragrant rice cooked with tender meat, aromatic spices, and a unique blend of masalas, renowned for it's rich flavor and distinct taste.

items.name: Papadi Chaat
items.description: A popular street food of India. Mini puris topped with mashed potato, onion, tomato, spicy green chutney, sweet tangy tamarind chutney, lots of sev and fresh coriander. A dish with a flavour bomb!

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Veg Singapore Noodles
items.description: Thin noodles stir-fried with various vegetables such as bell peppers, onions, carrots, and cabbage, along with paneer. The noodles are seasoned with a flavorful mixture of curry powder, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and chilli for a bit of heat. The result is a fragrant and tasty stir fried noodles

items.name: Chicken Singapore Noodles
items.description: Thin noodles stir-fried with various vegetables such as bell peppers, onions, carrots, and cabbage, along with chicken. The noodles are seasoned with a flavorful mixture of curry powder, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and chilli for a bit of heat. The result is a fragrant and tasty stir fried noodles.

items.name: Siddhu
items.description: A traditional Himachali dish, consisting of stuffed wheat flour dumplings filled with ingredients like walnut, greens, and spices steamed to perfection. It's a flavorful and wholesome specialty of the Himachal Pradesh. (2 pieces)

items.name: Kichidi
items.description: A comforting and wholesome Indian dish made by cooking rice and lentils together with a variety of spices. It is tempered with ghee (clarified butter) and flavored with cumin, turmeric, and other spices.

items.name: Goan Alsande Tonak
items.description: A Goan dish made from kidney beans and potatoes. The "Tonak" masala has unique blend of whole spices which gives this dish it's iconic flavour.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Prawns Umman
items.description: A delectable dish from the coastal state of Goa. Prawns cooked in a rich and flavorful coconut-based gravy, infused with aromatic spices like cumin, coriander, turmeric, and red chili. This dish encapsulates the essence of Goan cuisine, offering a harmonious blend of seafood and tropical flavors.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Mashed Potato Chops
items.description: A delightful Goan snack made by stuffing mashed potatoes with a seasoned mixture of minced chicken, onions, green chilies, and spices. These potato patties are then coated in breadcrumbs and fried until golden brown. (4 pieces)

items.name: Goan Ross Omlette
items.description: A comforting food from Goa. Goan chicken curry cooked with coconut, garlic, onion and home made spice mix and topped with an omelette and fresh coriander. Served with 2 pav.

items.name: Gujarati Bhindi Ravaiyan
items.description: A delicious Gujarati dish made with okra (bhindi) and semolina (rava). The okra is saut√©ed with mustard seeds, cumin seeds, turmeric, and other spices until tender, and then mixed with roasted semolina to create a flavorful and textured dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapati + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bohri Lamb Curry
items.description: A rich and aromatic dish from the Bohra Muslim community, featuring tender lamb cooked in a fragrant gravy infused with a blend of traditional spices and herbs, offering a delightful taste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Handvo
items.description: A traditional Gujarati savory cake made from a blend of rice, lentils, and vegetables. It's seasoned with spices, mustard seeds, curry leaves, and grated coconut, cooked on a griddle until crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, creating a flavorful and nutritious snack.

items.name: Gujrati Dal & Chawal
items.description: A light and flavorful lentil dish from Gujarat, prepared with tuvar dal and seasoned with a tempering of mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and aromatic spices, offering a delightful balance of sweetness and tanginess. Served with rice,

items.name: Mattu Gulla Huli
items.description: A traditional dish from Karnataka featuring Mattu Gulla (eggplants) cooked in a tangy and spicy gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Pandi Curry
items.description: A delicacy of Coorg. An intensly flavourful pork belly curry cooked with freshly made spices, onion, curry leaves and simmered away for the melt in your mouth flavour.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Sundal
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with chickpeas and coconut packed with a lot of flavour.

items.name: Puli Sadam
items.description: A tangy South Indian rice dish, featuring cooked rice mixed with a spicy tamarind paste infused with aromatic spices, creating a burst of flavors in every mouthful, perfect for a satisfying meal

items.name: Paneer Tikka Aloo Dum Biryani
items.description: A flavorful Indian dish that combines marinated paneer tikka (grilled cottage cheese) and baby potatoes with aromatic biryani rice. The dish is layered and slow-cooked to perfection, allowing the spices and flavors to infuse into the rice, creating a rich and delicious one-pot meal. Served with raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Lucknowi Lamb Biryani
items.description: A fragrant and indulgent dish originating from the culinary traditions of Lucknow, India. It features tender pieces of lamb marinated in a blend of yogurt and spices, layered with aromatic long-grain Basmati rice, caramelized onions, saffron-infused milk, and a variety of spices. Slow-cooked to perfection. Served with raita + papad + achar.

items.name: Aloo Kathi Roll
items.description: A popular Indian street food made with a spiced potato filling wrapped in a soft, flaky paratha (Indian flatbread). The potatoes are cooked with onions, green chilies, ginger, and spices like cumin, coriander, and garam masala, creating a flavorful and hearty filling. The paratha is then rolled around the potato mixture along with some tangy chutney and crunchy onions to create a delicious and satisfying handheld snack.

items.name: Soya Pulao
items.description: A nutritious rice dish where fragrant basmati rice is cooked with protein-rich soya granules and aromatic spices, offering a delicious and wholesome vegetarian meal
